Topic.Title: Sherlock Holmes and the case of Shanon Boyle

Posts.EditableText:
So hey everyone, after fiddling around for a few days with the engine, I'd like to release a preview of this game, I think it's coming along quite nice, it's based of of the 1954-1955 TV series starring Ronald Howard, Archie Duncan and Howard Marion Crawford.

Spelling mistakes and glitches will be fixed
This is a work-in-progress and will not be done for a long time.
